item.title: Getting Started with Tiling WM [Part 2] - Rofi
item.description: In the part1, I’ve used rofi instead of dmenu. This part will show you how to start with rofi. 1. Introduction # Rofi is a window switcher, application launcher and dmenu replacement. Features: Fully configurable keyboard navigation. Type to filer. Built-in modes: Window switcher mode. Application laucher. Desktop file application launcher. SSH laucher mode. History-based ordering. … 2. Getting started # Installing rofi is quite easy. sudo apt install rofi -y Run it for the first time.
